Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.formats.hpo

Interface HpoDiseaseAnnotation

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<HpoDiseaseAnnotation>, Identified
public interface HpoDiseaseAnnotation extends Identified, Comparable<HpoDiseaseAnnotation>
HpoDiseaseAnnotation aggregates the presentation of single phenotypic feature observed in a cohort of patients diagnosed with a disease (i.e. Arachnodactyly (HP:0001166) in Marfan syndrome (OMIM:154700)).

HpoDiseaseAnnotation aggregates frequency of the phenotypic feature in patients diagnosed with a disease. The frequency is modeled as a ratio() n/m where n is the number of patients presenting the feature, and m is the cohort size. The feature frequency is available through frequency().

The temporal aspect of the feature presentation is exposed via the following methods:

  • earliestOnset()
  • latestOnset()
  • earliestResolution()
  • latestResolution()
In addition, observedInInterval(TemporalInterval) provides a Ratio of patients presenting the feature in provided TemporalInterval.

The evidence supporting the phenotypic feature is available via references(). The modifiers are exposed via modifiers().

  • Method Details

    • of

      static HpoDiseaseAnnotation of(TermId id, Collection<HpoDiseaseAnnotationRecord> records)

    • ratio

      Ratio ratio()
      Returns:
      ratio representing a total number of the cohort members who displayed presence of the phenotypic feature represented by HpoDiseaseAnnotation at some point in their life.

    • earliestOnset

      Optional<PointInTime> earliestOnset()
      Returns:
      PointInTime representing the earliest onset of the phenotypic feature in patient cohort.

    • latestOnset

      Optional<PointInTime> latestOnset()
      Returns:
      PointInTime representing the latest onset of the phenotypic feature in patient cohort.

    • earliestResolution

      Optional<PointInTime> earliestResolution()
      Returns:
      PointInTime representing the earliest resolution of the phenotypic feature in patient cohort.

    • latestResolution

      Optional<PointInTime> latestResolution()
      Returns:
      PointInTime representing the latest resolution of the phenotypic feature in patient cohort.

    • observedInInterval

      int observedInInterval(TemporalInterval query)
      Get the number of patients presenting a phenotypic feature in given TemporalInterval.
      Parameters:
      query - query temporal interval.

    • modifiers

      List<TermId> modifiers()
      Returns:
      a list of disease annotation modifiers.

    • references

      List<AnnotationReference> references()
      Returns:
      AnnotationReferences that support presence/absence of the disease annotation.

    • frequency

      default float frequency()
      Returns:
      frequency of this HpoDiseaseAnnotation in the cohort of individuals used to assert the presence of the annotation in an HpoDisease.

    • isAbsent

      default boolean isAbsent()
      Returns:
      true if the phenotypic feature in question was annotated to be absent in the disease (meaning that the numerator of ratio() is zero, because an annotation such as 0/k exists that represents a study in which zero of k study participants were observed not to have the HPO term in question).

    • isPresent

      default boolean isPresent()
      Returns:
      the opposite of what isAbsent() returns.
      See Also:
      • isAbsent()
